title: Spanish Pieces of Eight
description: A riveting story of family, foreign waters, and a fortune beyond your wildest dreams…Hours before undoing a complicated and family-busting competition for a vast treasure trove of Spanish gold, Richard Dennison dies–leaving his spoiled children to piece together the clues to track down their inheritance. This modern-day Caribbean treasure hunt catapults four unwilling siblings–Jimmy, Alice, Zach, and Maureen–into a battle of wit and greed, and it threatens to change the family forever. Can they uncover the fortune or will the clues slip through their fingertips?
author: Rick Glaze
